programme.title: Cat And Rat
programme.desc: Annabel is in Gregs life just to rip him, her deceit and perfect manipulation works perfectly on him. However, the rat in the house will frustrate this cat out of the house.

programme.title: Local King
programme.desc: A queen is determined to ensure her son ascends the throne after her husbands death. However, the story takes an unexpected turn when her sons fate diverges from the crown.

programme.title: Chasing Clout
programme.desc: Collette will do anything to have a perfect relationship, but her man Richard will always be the bully he is.

programme.title: Home Trouble
programme.desc: Korkor lost his mother at a young age and his father decides to bring in his estranged wife with her son. This topples the entire family, and a truth is revealed.

programme.title: Delivery Agent
programme.desc: Sabinus the delivery man ends up as a maid in Kates house after breaking her delivery package.This starts the beginning of a new life for both of them.

programme.title: The Cab Man
programme.desc: Pedro the cab man is on a mission of finding his long-lost sister Amarachi, he stumbles on Abigail, who will make all his searching come to an end.

programme.title: Come Back To Me
programme.desc: Nancy is supposed to marry Chucks, but she lost the chance to her twin sister Jane because of Nmecha her fiancee who has promised her marriage for over 10 years.

programme.title: Lies Men Tell
programme.desc: Patrick secretly juggled two families: a wife and daughter in one home, and a pregnant fiancee in another. His carefully constructed lie shatters the moment the two women meet.

programme.title: Two Hearts One Battle
programme.desc: Ade and Nnena fall in love in a toxic environment where their mothers are at war with each other, this leads to Nnennas rejection of Ade but he has something up his sleeve.

programme.title: Ring Or No Ring
programme.desc: Three women, eager to settle down, find themselves tangled in a mix of emotions, But when a simple joke goes too far, it leads to a situation that could change everything.

programme.title: Iniquity
programme.desc: A bishop leaves a church for a lady, but she commits several evil with the love of her life. When she is caught, she has to make a decision that will change everything forever.

programme.title: Thighs Of The Queen
programme.desc: The future of the entire kingdom lies on the hands of an adulterous queen who will go to any length to make her needs granted.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna goes on an adventure. Ugomma does a masterclass in power, and the hunters face the aftermath.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna goes on an adventure. Ugomma does a masterclass in power, and the hunters face the aftermath.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Ojigijaga predicts curses and doom at Adannas marriage ceremony to Nwoye, Mmadiya makes her move.

programme.title: The Kings Dream
programme.desc: After king Jamike dies, the kingdom goes into disarray and turmoil. This will continue until a worthy king is found, but will the wickedness of man let Ikemefuna win?

programme.title: The Sacrifice
programme.desc: In her dying bed, Anitas mother wish that Ikenga his brother does not see her body or have access to her corpse. This wish will turn the entire family apart.

programme.title: Echoes Of Integrity
programme.desc: An upright government worker is sacked for his honesty and becomes very poor afterwards. Will he go back on his morals as he gets a new job?

programme.title: Wife Material
programme.desc: Ikenna marries Akudo to avoid the mistake his father made, marrying an educated woman. But, Debby, his classy coworker, has his heart divided.

programme.title: Complex And Complicated
programme.desc: A prince falls in love with Awele that is supposed to be used as a sacrifice, will his farther the king support him?

programme.title: Brutal Truth
programme.desc: Dorathy and Monica are sisters who are entangled with always sleeping with the same man. It gets worse when Elliot gets both of them pregnant.

programme.title: Polygamy And War
programme.desc: Chief Williams is determined to acquire Nnaemekas family land. His scheme nearly succeeds until his own son opposes him, disrupting his plans.

programme.title: Pretty Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa, a charming con artist, targets Adeola in a jewelry shop, but the scheme backfires, forcing her to face unexpected consequences for her actions.

programme.title: Trouble Girlfriend
programme.desc: A village champion, Monica is battling a princess of a land for a man. Who wins him over in this drama that is full of suspense and humor.

programme.title: Sweet Diana
programme.desc: A male servant kills his rich employer wanting to inherit her wealth. But all did not go as planned.

programme.title: Colour of the Loyalty
programme.desc: A triad boss elite guards need to protect him from assassination. As one guard witnesses the elimination of other triad bosses, he unravels a huge conspiracy.

programme.desc: A young warrior teams up with his master and a band of heroes to find two celestial swords, so as to fight the Blood Demon seeking to wreak havoc upon the world.

programme.title: Iceman

programme.title: Twin Dragons

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.
